item.description:
Shomari is back @ Leon's



Join us for a great band, fun and dancing!!


Shomari
Brothers Rahsaan and N'namdi Langley headline this R&B phenomenon that can be seen all over the the country getting the party started. With a history of great shows at Cafe Bottegas in beautiful Downtown New Haven (across from the green) every 1st Friday of the month, and Humphrey's East, at the corners of Humphrey and East Street, they've developed a loyal following of devoted fans who know a good thing when they hear it. They can also be found at venues all over Connecticut.

They can often be found in collaboration with the outstanding talents of Teddy Riley, Bobby Brown, Lauryn Hill, Kool G Rap, Joe Buddens and Misa (who happens to be the biggest R&B singer in Japan), as well as other famous and fabulously talented musicians and artists from through out the world to bring an amazing experience to everyone around them.
item.how_to_find_us: Look for us at the Bar.

group.name: PartyExpress !! Let's Get Together and have Fun!

item.name: Shomari @ leon's
